page.title: 07 COMPUTERS
page.content: I did a survey of{computers}in my own class asking which children have computers and which children do not. If they had not got one they had to choose, from a list,one which they had used and liked the most. The{ZX {Spectrum}was the easy winner, second came the{Apple Macintosh}and joint third came the{BBC B, Acorn Electron and a{Spectrum +.}In 1985 our school had three{micro computers;}a BBC B, an Acorn Electron and a ZX-81 with a{16k {R.A.M. (Random Access Memory). }We have a selection of{Software}for all of our micros. I share a micro with my sister, our micro is a{16k ZX {Spectrum,}we have a selection of software and I use the manual to write {programs}and to find things out about the computer. My favourite computer game is{Space Invaders. }There are no computer shops in Port Sunlight.
